traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The hunter can hold its breath for up to 10 minutes.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hunter has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hunter's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The hunter makes one Bone Harpoon attack and one Tusk attack.

actions.name: Bone Harpoon
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage. Hit or Miss: The harpoon returns to the hunter's hand.

actions.name: Tusk
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4 damage) slashing damage.
